description: This app allows actions to take place on a Cisco ASA

inputs.description: This should be the ip or dns address of the cisco asa
inputs.name: device

inputs.description: This should be the username you would use to SSH into the cisco asa
inputs.name: username

inputs.description: This should be the password you would use to SSH into the cisco asa
inputs.name: password

inputs.description: This would be the port you would use to SSH into the cisco asa. Default is TCP/22
inputs.name: port

inputs.description: This is the `enable` password within a cisco asa
inputs.name: secret

inputs.description: This will be the "action" you are wanting to take on the cisco asa. You can see in the if statement what your options are.
inputs.name: action
